prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a fortress with unique geometric features.
Generate an ancient-looking Pokemon with a sturdy body and multiple legs for stability.
Design a Pokemon that is a fusion of stone and technology, featuring glowing accents.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of a mountain and ancient ruins.
Show me a unique Pokemon that has a square shape and is built for defense.
Give me a detailed description of a mythical Pokemon with a massive, blocky appearance.
Make a Pokemon that has a sturdy build and blends seamlessly into rocky environments.
